website_summaries.verdict: Award-winning foundation that provides long-lasting, natural-looking coverage.
pros: Uses ActiveForce Technology to ensure a flawless look even on a hot day
SPF 30 to protect you from the sun
Evens out the tone and texture of your skin
cons: Tends to stick to dry patches, so be sure to exfoliate before use

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this makeup! I've tried so many different ones and they can't compare. The coverage is so smooth and flawless. You just use a little amount and it goes a long way. Feels like powder once applied. Not heavy, greasy, or thick. If you're thinking about trying this, trust me, it's worth it! I have tried so many foundations and some work but are too greasy, or too thick. This one is so light and fresh. I have reddish skin and have always been self conscious of my redness. This covers it with just a small amount. Looks like I have no makeup on & feels light and powdery. You'll be happy you tried it!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed when I tried this foundation
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I tried this foundation. I was actually meaning to buy the Synchro Skin Glow foundation and accidently bought this one. Tried it anyways and it was not the same. The makeup creased in the lines in my forehead half way through the day and I was able to wipe the makeup clear off my skin with the touch of my finger. Also did not have great coverage. But overall I have always loved Shiseido's foundations liquid and powder but this one does not make that list.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I tried this exact one at Macy's before I got it and this was not the same at all
customer_reviews.author: Sweetcks

customer_reviews.title: Great long lasting wear
customer_reviews.text: I recently started trying Shiseido products. So far I have been impressed with all of their skincare and makeup. What I like about this foundations is 1) it is lightweight at the same time giving you decent coverage 2) it stays put all day 3) it doesn't feel or look cakey 3) sets well (I do use a finishing powder with it) Using a primer doesn't seem to make any difference in wear. Make sure to give this foundation a good shake before every use.
customer_reviews.author: d. schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Not for aging skin
customer_reviews.text: I love the lightness of this foundation but my 65yo skin which is beginning to have the crepey texture, does not like the way the make-up settles in the fine lines and emphasizes the lines. Also, my Lancome color does not equal the recommended shade; the Shiseido was darker.
customer_reviews.author: josie

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a fluid foundation, this one is so silky, feels great on skin and lasts through the day. It has become my favorite foundation after Armani discontinued their face fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Yana Khmelnik

customer_reviews.title: Positive radiance
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation. It’s a perfect match to my complexion. It goes on smooth and lasts hours . It makes my face smooth and refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simply love this product/ applies easily/ keeps the skin looking youthfull...
customer_reviews.author: hazelnut

customer_reviews.title: and I love the coverage of this foundation
customer_reviews.text: Received product quickly, and I love the coverage of this foundation
customer_reviews.author: Kate Close

customer_reviews.title: Shiseido
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with Shiseido and the price of the item
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Ong

customer_reviews.title: Shiseido created a wonderful product with this foundation.
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely foundation that goes on smoothly with good coverage. It is not heavy. It does not make my face look shiny and it lasts all day. The only thing that I would like to see Shiseido change about this product would be to eliminate the sunscreen, Octinoxate, and replace it with Zinc Oxide. Still, though, this product deserves my five-star rating because it is a very nice foundation
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: good that comes with spf
customer_reviews.text: it is medium cover as all shiseido products blends well on the skin . good that comes with spf. because its Matte it makes face loose all the sheer i guess it will be good for someone with oily skin. Loved the products. one star less cause I have combined skin and for me it turned out to be too pale. Neutral undertone, went with neutral 2
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: I really like this foundation but find I need to use only ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this foundation but find I need to use only a small bit of it otherwise, my skin looks fake. It's not total coverage as any redness or blemishes still show through and I still need to apply concealer. But it is a very nice foundation, just know you need to apply concealer as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shriner

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Skin tone selection is not as good as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product color is too dark for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Overall Coverage, Lightweight, and a Perfect Foundation for Anyone.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this foundation. I only need one pump and it covers my entire face. It’s lightweight but still adds the coverage I need. It’s a bit pricey but well worth it as it’s going to last me a long time. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Simpson

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST EVER! COVER SMOOTHLY LOOKS NATURAL LASTS ALL DAY ...
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST EVER! COVER SMOOTHLY LOOKS NATURAL LASTS ALL DAY NEED SMALL AMOUNT SHOULD PURCHASE THEIR FOUNDATION BRUSH IS OUT OF THIS WORLD GREAT
customer_reviews.author: Rose L.

customer_reviews.title: great product, smooth creamy with nice coverage-the rose is ...
customer_reviews.text: great product , smooth creamy with nice coverage-the rose is perfect for my light pinkish skin tone, want to get a second bottle-bought it at macy's at salespersons rec and am happy with it
customer_reviews.author: PianoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: The best foundation I’ve ever worn. Very light on my skin with an incredibly natural finish. I haven’t worn it for a long time so I cannot speak to its “long-lasting” effect.
customer_reviews.author: Liana

product_meta.title: Shiseido Synchro Skin Lasting Liquid Women's SPF 20 Foundation, No. 3 Neutral, 1 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:No. 3 NeutralThis smart, oil-free, long-lasting foundation beautifully enhances your complexion while helping skin maintain its clarity and preventing creasing, fading and shine all day long. Flawlessly undetectable like it belongs on your skin. Natural finish.
feature_bullets: An innovative, oil-free, and long-lasting foundation with medium buildable coverage that beautifully enhances your complexion by harmonizing with your skin for a natural-looking finish
Flawlessly undetectable like it belongs to your skin, this foundation feels uniquely airy and silky on skin it helps maintain the skin's clarity and minimize shine, creasing, and fading all day
Apply after skincare, smoothing on evenly from the center of the face outward
